ing: 2 fluid ounces spiced rum (such as Captain Morgan'sÂ®)
des: "A friend of mine and I were trying to make use of spiced rum and this is our new favorite drink!"
ins: Place the mint leaves, lime wedges, and ice into a cocktail shaker; mash well with a cocktail muddler. Pour in the simple syrup, lime juice, rum, cranberry juice, and soda water. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled glass to serve.
